Ex-service Men'AssociationJBeTfastT '- Bated "June I;7"yJ920.(Circulated for information)" We the Members of the Ulster Sx-service Men^8 Association hereby pledge ourselves to assist Your Majestyrs Government by all means in our power to restore law and order in Ulster. We further-beg to offer the services of 5000 trained ex-service men and women if Your Majesty's Government would accept them."Ulster 3x-service Men's Association,Belfast.2 Whitehall Gardens,a.1?.. , June 22, 1920..
